page.title: 11Marsh Farm, Vange.
page.content: This farm is situated in Vange, south of the railway line.Its buildings are just outside our grid reference but it farms about 150 acres on Vange marshes which is covered in our area. Miss Gardener and her family have been farming the land for many years.Miss Gardener's father came to the farm in 1893 and Miss Gardener herself who is 80 has lived on the farm all her life.Mr Searles and his sons now look after the farm and they are related to Miss Gardener. On Vange marshes the family graze cattle and grow crops such as wheat and barley and grass for silage.The farm is intensively managed with fertilizer being put on the land.As well as calves being born on the farm, calves are also bought from market and reared on the farm. Pitsea Junior School Group.
